ViaTypeclass

thing.t[10137]

Summary

Property
Details

Method
Details

A ViaType is an object used to define the preposition to use to describe various kinds of PushTravel. The language-specific part of the libary needs to override the various ViaType objects to give the names of the prepositions in the target language.

class ViaType :   object
